channel.title: Why wont my form work?

item.title: Why wont my form work?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]program powerfisher;

const
orecolor1 = 12433592; //sparkling water colors go here
orecolor2 = 8289404;
orecolor3 = 5976092;
delay = 2000 ;
var
x,y,net,bait,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername: integer;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Button1 : TButton;
Edit1 : TEdit;
style: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
net := BitmapFromString(39, 9, ‘z78DA737343000312811B097A21’ +
‘6AC8B1855A66E272AD1B0E805F0D71AE425689CBB598EAF1AB21E’ +
‘C774C7712E32FEAC529797E2727F406B74F894F2784C5F1BB1F7F’ +
‘1AA68D4F2949BDD48953DA9448A4C61D79E97C38E553727C4A7CD’ +
‘94B8A7F073EF58E1C0000708CC8A4’);

bait := BitmapFromString(18, 9, ‘z78DA333040003724604031C06’ +
‘F1A2E59371C00BF5EF2D413E32A5245F0871E7EDF1123426A1852’ +
‘2242AA9943C52E62E2CB0D2F20D555F40100FE73DDF5’);

clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, ‘z78DA33304000372440B’ +
‘C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412’ +
‘E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890’ +
‘F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433’ +
‘935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0’ +
‘A0400510ADDFF’);

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');
   
     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');
   
     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');
   
     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');

end;

procedure initform;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 291;
frmDesign.Top := 133;
frmDesign.Width := 340;
frmDesign.Height := 178;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 45;
Label1.Top := 39;
Label1.Width := 233;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := 'enter in box either: “cage” “lure” “bait” or “net” ';
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 117;
Button1.Top := 96;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Cursor := crHandPoint;
Button1.Caption := ‘&Done’;
Button1.ModalResult := 1;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 95;
Edit1.Top := 70;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 9;
Edit1.Text := ‘net’;
end;

procedure ButtonClick;
begin
case Edit1.Text of
‘net’ : Style := net;
‘bait’: Style := bait;
‘lure’ : //Style := lure; Change when you add that bitmap
‘cage’ : //Style := cage; Change when you add that bitmap
end;
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,orecolor1,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,162,185,316,286))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(4000)
findbitmap(clickhere,x,y);
wait(200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(style,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘netting fish’);
end;

procedure rest;
begin
movemouse(487,48);
wait(1000)
movemouse(283, 77);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(374, 70,true);
writeln(‘sleeping’);
wait(2000)
end;

begin
loaddmps; //Needa load em first ;D
try
initform;
frmDesign.ShowModal;
ButtonClick;
finally
freeform(frmDesign);
end;
repeat
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
logdouttest;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rest;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Yea, I have Msn xD

TimEatsSultanaBran@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Why wont my form work?
item.dc:creator: @fook fook
item.description:
@fook wrote:

[quote=“Nashi, post:7, topic:151605”]Ohhh
I see what your doing,
You want the button to use ModalResult to end the form, Then Use the Button Click procedure to Get what was in the box?

[code]program powerfisher;

const
orecolor1 = 12433592; //sparkling water colors go here
orecolor2 = 8289404;
orecolor3 = 5976092;
delay = 2000 ;
var
x,y,net,bait,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername: integer;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Button1 : TButton;
Edit1 : TEdit;
style: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
net := BitmapFromString(39, 9, ‘z78DA737343000312811B097A21’ +
‘6AC8B1855A66E272AD1B0E805F0D71AE425689CBB598EAF1AB21E’ +
‘C774C7712E32FEAC529797E2727F406B74F894F2784C5F1BB1F7F’ +
‘1AA68D4F2949BDD48953DA9448A4C61D79E97C38E553727C4A7CD’ +
‘94B8A7F073EF58E1C0000708CC8A4’);

bait := BitmapFromString(18, 9, ‘z78DA333040003724604031C06’ +
‘F1A2E59371C00BF5EF2D413E32A5245F0871E7EDF1123426A1852’ +
‘2242AA9943C52E62E2CB0D2F20D555F40100FE73DDF5’);

clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, ‘z78DA33304000372440B’ +
‘C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412’ +
‘E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890’ +
‘F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433’ +
‘935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0’ +
‘A0400510ADDFF’);

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');
   
     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');
   
     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');
   
     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');

end;

procedure initform;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 291;
frmDesign.Top := 133;
frmDesign.Width := 340;
frmDesign.Height := 178;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 45;
Label1.Top := 39;
Label1.Width := 233;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := 'enter in box either: “cage” “lure” “bait” or “net” ';
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 117;
Button1.Top := 96;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Cursor := crHandPoint;
Button1.Caption := ‘&Done’;
Button1.ModalResult := 1;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 95;
Edit1.Top := 70;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 9;
Edit1.Text := ‘net’;
end;

procedure ButtonClick;
begin
case Edit1.Text of
‘net’ : Style := net;
‘bait’: Style := bait;
‘lure’ : //Style := lure; Change when you add that bitmap
‘cage’ : //Style := cage; Change when you add that bitmap
end;
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,orecolor1,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,162,185,316,286))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(4000)
findbitmap(clickhere,x,y);
wait(200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(style,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘netting fish’);
end;

procedure rest;
begin
movemouse(487,48);
wait(1000)
movemouse(283, 77);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(374, 70,true);
writeln(‘sleeping’);
wait(2000)
end;

begin
loaddmps; //Needa load em first ;D
try
initform;
ButtonClick;
finally
freeform(frmDesign);
end;
repeat
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
logdouttest;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rest;
until(false)
end.[/code][/quote]

yea thats it well it compiles now but for some reason the form doesnt load lol :S u got msn what i can talk 2 u on nashi instead of this?

item.title: Why wont my form work?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Ohhh
I see what your doing,
You want the button to use ModalResult to end the form, Then Use the Button Click procedure to Get what was in the box?

[code]program powerfisher;

const
orecolor1 = 12433592; //sparkling water colors go here
orecolor2 = 8289404;
orecolor3 = 5976092;
delay = 2000 ;
var
x,y,net,bait,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername: integer;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Button1 : TButton;
Edit1 : TEdit;
style: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
net := BitmapFromString(39, 9, ‘z78DA737343000312811B097A21’ +
‘6AC8B1855A66E272AD1B0E805F0D71AE425689CBB598EAF1AB21E’ +
‘C774C7712E32FEAC529797E2727F406B74F894F2784C5F1BB1F7F’ +
‘1AA68D4F2949BDD48953DA9448A4C61D79E97C38E553727C4A7CD’ +
‘94B8A7F073EF58E1C0000708CC8A4’);

bait := BitmapFromString(18, 9, ‘z78DA333040003724604031C06’ +
‘F1A2E59371C00BF5EF2D413E32A5245F0871E7EDF1123426A1852’ +
‘2242AA9943C52E62E2CB0D2F20D555F40100FE73DDF5’);

clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, ‘z78DA33304000372440B’ +
‘C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412’ +
‘E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890’ +
‘F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433’ +
‘935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0’ +
‘A0400510ADDFF’);

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');
   
     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');
   
     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');
   
     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');

end;

procedure initform;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 291;
frmDesign.Top := 133;
frmDesign.Width := 340;
frmDesign.Height := 178;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 45;
Label1.Top := 39;
Label1.Width := 233;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := 'enter in box either: “cage” “lure” “bait” or “net” ';
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 117;
Button1.Top := 96;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Cursor := crHandPoint;
Button1.Caption := ‘&Done’;
Button1.ModalResult := 1;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 95;
Edit1.Top := 70;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 9;
Edit1.Text := ‘net’;
end;

procedure ButtonClick;
begin
case Edit1.Text of
‘net’ : Style := net;
‘bait’: Style := bait;
‘lure’ : //Style := lure; Change when you add that bitmap
‘cage’ : //Style := cage; Change when you add that bitmap
end;
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,orecolor1,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,162,185,316,286))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(4000)
findbitmap(clickhere,x,y);
wait(200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(style,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘netting fish’);
end;

procedure rest;
begin
movemouse(487,48);
wait(1000)
movemouse(283, 77);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(374, 70,true);
writeln(‘sleeping’);
wait(2000)
end;

begin
loaddmps; //Needa load em first ;D
try
initform;
ButtonClick;
finally
freeform(frmDesign);
end;
repeat
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
logdouttest;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rest;
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: Why wont my form work?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

FindBitmap uses Integers,
You were trying to change the bitmap depending on what they said, Correct?

[code]program powerfisher;

const
orecolor1 = 12433592; //sparkling water colors go here
orecolor2 = 8289404;
orecolor3 = 5976092;
delay = 2000 ;
var
x,y,net,bait,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername: integer;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Button1 : TButton;
Edit1 : TEdit;
style: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
net := BitmapFromString(39, 9, ‘z78DA737343000312811B097A21’ +
‘6AC8B1855A66E272AD1B0E805F0D71AE425689CBB598EAF1AB21E’ +
‘C774C7712E32FEAC529797E2727F406B74F894F2784C5F1BB1F7F’ +
‘1AA68D4F2949BDD48953DA9448A4C61D79E97C38E553727C4A7CD’ +
‘94B8A7F073EF58E1C0000708CC8A4’);

bait := BitmapFromString(18, 9, ‘z78DA333040003724604031C06’ +
‘F1A2E59371C00BF5EF2D413E32A5245F0871E7EDF1123426A1852’ +
‘2242AA9943C52E62E2CB0D2F20D555F40100FE73DDF5’);

clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, ‘z78DA33304000372440B’ +
‘C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412’ +
‘E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890’ +
‘F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433’ +
‘935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0’ +
‘A0400510ADDFF’);

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');
   
     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');
   
     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');
   
     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');

end;

procedure initform;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 291;
frmDesign.Top := 133;
frmDesign.Width := 340;
frmDesign.Height := 178;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 45;
Label1.Top := 39;
Label1.Width := 233;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := 'enter in box either: “cage” “lure” “bait” or “net” ';
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 117;
Button1.Top := 96;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Cursor := crHandPoint;
Button1.Caption := ‘&Done’;
Button1.ModalResult := 1;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 95;
Edit1.Top := 70;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 9;
Edit1.Text := ‘net’;
end;

procedure ButtonClick(Sender: TObject);
begin
case Edit1.Text of
‘net’ : Style := net;
‘bait’: Style := bait;
end;
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,orecolor1,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,162,185,316,286))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(4000)
findbitmap(clickhere,x,y);
wait(200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(style,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘netting fish’);
end;

procedure rest;
begin
movemouse(487,48);
wait(1000)
movemouse(283, 77);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(374, 70,true);
writeln(‘sleeping’);
wait(2000)
end;

begin
initform;
ButtonClick(Sender: TObject);
loaddmps;
repeat
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
logdouttest;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rest;
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: Why wont my form work?
item.dc:creator: @fook fook
item.description:
@fook wrote:

ok i’m making an all in 1 autofishing script for RSCD (an rsc private server). The script before i added the form worked pretty much flawless, but it only did 1 type of fishing.
Basicly ive decided to put a form for the user to type what he/she wants the script 2 do EG. Cage,harpoon,net,lure,bait as opposed to the non-form way of only being able to do one of these things.
However i keep getting this error …
“Line 156: [Error] (156:22): Type mismatch in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\fisherrscd.scar”

What the script is MENT to do is…
Take the text from the Edit1.Text,
Put it in the procedure ButtonClick(Sender: TObject); so that style = edit1.text,
Then procedure clickingbmp; uses findbitmap(style,x,y); to match with the ready loaded bitmaps for each style.

heres to code of my script,

[code]program powerfisher;

const
orecolor1 = 12433592; //sparkling water colors go here
orecolor2 = 8289404;
orecolor3 = 5976092;
delay = 2000 ;
var
x,y,net,bait,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername: integer;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Button1 : TButton;
Edit1 : TEdit;
style: string;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
net := BitmapFromString(39, 9, ‘z78DA737343000312811B097A21’ +
‘6AC8B1855A66E272AD1B0E805F0D71AE425689CBB598EAF1AB21E’ +
‘C774C7712E32FEAC529797E2727F406B74F894F2784C5F1BB1F7F’ +
‘1AA68D4F2949BDD48953DA9448A4C61D79E97C38E553727C4A7CD’ +
‘94B8A7F073EF58E1C0000708CC8A4’);

bait := BitmapFromString(18, 9, ‘z78DA333040003724604031C06’ +
‘F1A2E59371C00BF5EF2D413E32A5245F0871E7EDF1123426A1852’ +
‘2242AA9943C52E62E2CB0D2F20D555F40100FE73DDF5’);

clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, ‘z78DA33304000372440B’ +
‘C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412’ +
‘E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890’ +
‘F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433’ +
‘935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0’ +
‘A0400510ADDFF’);

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');
   
     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');
   
     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');
   
     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');

end;

procedure initform;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 291;
frmDesign.Top := 133;
frmDesign.Width := 340;
frmDesign.Height := 178;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 45;
Label1.Top := 39;
Label1.Width := 233;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := 'enter in box either: “cage” “lure” “bait” or “net” ';
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 117;
Button1.Top := 96;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Cursor := crHandPoint;
Button1.Caption := ‘&Done’;
Button1.ModalResult := 1;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 95;
Edit1.Top := 70;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 9;
Edit1.Text := ‘net’;
end;

procedure ButtonClick(Sender: TObject);
begin
style:=Edit1.Text;
end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,orecolor1,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor2,162,185,316,286))or
(findcolor(x,y,orecolor3,162,185,316,286))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(4000)
findbitmap(clickhere,x,y);
wait(200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(style,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘netting fish’);
end;

procedure rest;
begin
movemouse(487,48);
wait(1000)
movemouse(283, 77);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(374, 70,true);
writeln(‘sleeping’);
wait(2000)
end;

begin
initform;
ButtonClick(Sender: TObject);
loaddmps;
repeat
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
logdouttest;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
rest;
until(false)
end.[/code]

NOTE: i know i havnt used the SRL mouse commands this is because im on a private RSC server and im not bothered about detectability

help will be GREATLY appreciated! thx, fooktard
